Name: RPG Merchant
About the game: Ever wondered what life is like for a merchant in a role-playing game? Wonder no more! Experience life behind the counter in RPG Merchant, a VR game that lets you serve customers and face unexpected challenges with the help of a mysterious wizard. Features: - Run a store that sells weapons, potions, equipment and more! - Defend against thieves and muggers - Progress through increasingly difficult Story levels and Challenge Modes - Take on Endless Mode to see how long you can last! NOTE: VR headset required!
